title: I have done all of the arcade missions, but......
body:
I have done all of the arcade missions and got 200 tickets, my question is that there no more missions showing up, are there any additional missions to get tickets?
I can't find the daily missions thing, and I wanna also ask are there any summoners icon rewards?
because till now I didn't receive any summoner icon except the starting one.

replies.body: It doesn't look like you've bought either of the passes, but if you decide to you'll get access to some bonus missions as well. The Mini-Pass will activate daily missions for you, and the Dungeon Pass will activate the dailies as well as 3 other mission lines featured around the new Battle Bosses!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=r2i33tLl,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-14T21:58:47.806+0000)
>
> It doesn't look like you've bought either of the passes, but if you decide to you'll get access to some bonus missions as well. The Mini-Pass will activate daily missions for you, and the Dungeon Pass will activate the dailies as well as 3 other mission lines featured around the new Battle Bosses!

I have bought the dungeon pass yet I have the same issue. When I go to the store it doesn't say that I bought it but it doesn't say anything about me being able to purchase it. This has been going on for the past 2-3 days now.

So.....your problem is that you've already bought the Dungeon Pass and the store won't let you buy it again? You won't be able to purchase that pass more than once, the store is just preventing you from effectively buying nothing.
